title: Englishpod 初级 英文播客 0299

segments.en: Hello, everyone, and welcome to EnglishPod.
segments.cn: 大家好，欢迎来到EnglishPod。

segments.en: My name is Marco.
segments.cn: 我叫Marco。

segments.en: My name is Catherine, and we're going shopping today at EnglishPod.
segments.cn: 我叫Catherine，今天我们要去EnglishPod购物。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: Today we are going to the store because we want to return a product.
segments.cn: 今天我们要去商店，因为我们想退货。

segments.en: So maybe the product that we bought had some problem, and we want our money back.
segments.cn: 也许我们买的产品有问题，我们想要退款。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So let's take a listen to today's dialogue, and we'll be back in a moment to talk more about what's going on.
segments.cn: 让我们来听一下今天的对话，稍后我们会回来讨论发生了什么。

segments.en: Hi.
segments.cn: 嗨。

segments.en: I would like to return this TV.
segments.cn: 我想退这台电视。

segments.en: Sure.
segments.cn: 当然。

segments.en: Do you have a receipt?
segments.cn: 你有收据吗？

segments.en: Yeah.
segments.cn: 有的。

segments.en: Here you go.
segments.cn: 给你。

segments.en: Actually, I also want to return this keyboard.
segments.cn: 其实，我还想退这个键盘。

segments.en: Okay.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: May I ask what the reason for returning these products is?
segments.cn: 请问退这些产品的原因是什么？

segments.en: The TV flickers a lot when I am watching a movie, and at times the image is not very clear.
segments.cn: 电视在我看电影时经常闪烁，有时画面不太清晰。

segments.en: I see.
segments.cn: 我明白了。

segments.en: And what about the keyboard?
segments.cn: 那键盘呢？

segments.en: I spilled some coffee on it, and now it won't work.
segments.cn: 我把咖啡洒在上面，现在它不工作了。

segments.en: I'm sorry, ma'am, but we can only exchange or refund defective products.
segments.cn: 对不起，女士，但我们只能退换有缺陷的产品。

segments.en: We cannot take responsibility for misuse or damages.
segments.cn: 我们不能对误用或损坏负责。

segments.en: Fine.
segments.cn: 好吧。

segments.en: I don't know why they make these things so delicate anyways.
segments.cn: 我不知道为什么他们做的东西这么脆弱。

segments.en: All right.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: We're back.
segments.cn: 我们回来了。

segments.en: So now let's take a look at some of those keywords on language takeaway.
segments.cn: 现在让我们看看一些语言要点的关键词。

segments.en: So we've got a great bunch of words for you here today.
segments.cn: 今天我们为你准备了一些很棒的单词。

segments.en: The first three are nouns, and then afterwards we've got a couple of adjectives to describe those nouns.
segments.cn: 前三个是名词，之后是几个形容词来描述这些名词。

segments.en: But first up, we have the word receipt.
segments.cn: 首先，我们有“收据”这个词。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So we want to return the television, and the worker there asks us if we have the receipt.
segments.cn: 我们想退电视，工作人员问我们是否有收据。

segments.en: Okay.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: A receipt is a small piece of paper that you receive from a clerk or a server after you buy something.
segments.cn: 收据是一小张纸，你在购买东西后从店员或服务员那里收到。

segments.en: So if I buy a TV, I will have this small piece of paper that says that I paid $500 for the TV.
segments.cn: 所以如果我买了一台电视，我会有这张小纸条，上面写着我为电视支付了500美元。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So usually they will ask you for the receipt to see when you bought the product and if you bought the product at that store.
segments.cn: 通常他们会要求你出示收据，以查看你何时购买了产品，以及你是否在那家商店购买的。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So the receipt has all sorts of information, date, time, method of payment, cost, all those things.
segments.cn: 所以收据上有各种信息，日期、时间、付款方式、费用，所有这些。

segments.en: And it's very important if you ever want to return something.
segments.cn: 如果你想退东西，这非常重要。

segments.en: Now, later on in the dialogue, the character explains why he wants to return the TV.
segments.cn: 现在，在对话中，角色解释了他想退电视的原因。

segments.en: Now Marco, why does he want to do that?
segments.cn: Marco，他为什么想这样做？

segments.en: Well, he has a problem with the TV when he's watching a movie.
segments.cn: 嗯，他在看电影时遇到了电视的问题。

segments.en: Basically, the image is not very clear.
segments.cn: 基本上，画面不太清晰。

segments.en: So this is the keyword image.
segments.cn: 所以这是关键词“画面”。

segments.en: So image can mean a couple of different things.
segments.cn: “画面”可以有几种不同的意思。

segments.en: You might hear the word image to mean a photograph or a picture like on a computer.
segments.cn: 你可能会听到“画面”这个词，指的是照片或计算机上的图片。

segments.en: But in this case, the image is how well you can see the images on TV, the things on TV.
segments.cn: 但在这种情况下，画面是指你在电视上看到的图像的清晰度。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So on TV, it's like you're seeing many, many images all at once or very rapidly together.
segments.cn: 所以在电视上，你就像是同时看到很多很多图像，或者非常快速地看到。

segments.en: So maybe if you can't see clearly, you say that the image is not clear on the TV.
segments.cn: 所以如果你看不清楚，你会说电视上的画面不清晰。

segments.en: All right.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: So if it's fuzzy, like there's gray and black, the image is not clear.
segments.cn: 如果画面模糊，比如有灰色和黑色，画面就不清晰。

segments.en: You can also say that, you know, I really like my new TV.
segments.cn: 你也可以说，我真的很喜欢我的新电视。

segments.en: The image is very clear.
segments.cn: 画面非常清晰。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: Okay.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: And not only are we returning a TV, but we're also returning a keyboard.
segments.cn: 我们不仅退电视，还退键盘。

segments.en: All right.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: A keyboard, a key is something that you can push.
segments.cn: 键盘，键是你可以按的东西。

segments.en: But a keyboard is this thing that you use with your computer to type words.
segments.cn: 但键盘是你用来在计算机上输入文字的东西。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So many of you who are using the website as we speak are using a keyboard and a mouse.
segments.cn: 所以你们中许多人在使用网站时正在使用键盘和鼠标。

segments.en: So these are probably one of the two most well-known objects when you're using a computer.
segments.cn: 所以这些可能是你使用计算机时最知名的两个物品之一。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: And keyboards come in many different shapes and sizes.
segments.cn: 键盘有很多不同的形状和大小。

segments.en: You can buy French keyboards and Russian keyboards.
segments.cn: 你可以购买法语键盘和俄语键盘。

segments.en: So keyboard is the general word for this tool.
segments.cn: 所以“键盘”是这个工具的通用词。

segments.en: Okay.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: So we are returning the keyboard and the clerk explains that we can only return it if it is defective, if the product is defective.
segments.cn: 所以我们正在退键盘，店员解释说只有在产品有缺陷时才能退。

segments.en: All right.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: So this is one of those adjectives I talked about a minute ago.
segments.cn: 这就是我刚才提到的形容词之一。

segments.en: Adjectives describe things.
segments.cn: 形容词用来描述事物。

segments.en: So my keyboard is defective or this TV is defective.
segments.cn: 所以我的键盘是有缺陷的，或者这台电视是有缺陷的。

segments.en: That means it doesn't work.
segments.cn: 这意味着它不工作。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So we have a defective product.
segments.cn: 所以我们有一个有缺陷的产品。

segments.en: It's not working properly.
segments.cn: 它工作不正常。

segments.en: It has some problem.
segments.cn: 它有一些问题。

segments.en: And, well, the guy was complaining that he didn't understand why these things like the keyboard are so delicate.
segments.cn: 而且，这个家伙抱怨说他不明白为什么像键盘这样的东西这么脆弱。

segments.en: All right.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: Delicate is something you might see written on the side of a box when you receive a package.
segments.cn: “脆弱”是你在收到包裹时可能会在盒子侧面看到的字。

segments.en: Something that is delicate breaks very easily.
segments.cn: 脆弱的东西很容易破碎。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So you have to handle with care.
segments.cn: 所以你必须小心处理。

segments.en: So, for example, glass is very delicate.
segments.cn: 例如，玻璃是非常脆弱的。

segments.en: It can break easily.
segments.cn: 它很容易破碎。

segments.en: All right.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: Glass is delicate, but stones, a big rock, that's not delicate.
segments.cn: 玻璃是脆弱的，但石头，大石头，那就不脆弱。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: All right.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: So that's all we have for language takeaway.
segments.cn: 这就是我们关于语言要点的全部内容。

segments.en: Let's review everything and listen to our dialogue.
segments.cn: 让我们复习一下所有内容，听我们的对话。

segments.en: Hi.
segments.cn: 嗨。

segments.en: I would like to return this TV.
segments.cn: 我想退这台电视。

segments.en: Sure.
segments.cn: 当然。

segments.en: Do you have a receipt?
segments.cn: 你有收据吗？

segments.en: Yeah.
segments.cn: 有的。

segments.en: Here you go.
segments.cn: 给你。

segments.en: Actually, I also want to return this keyboard.
segments.cn: 其实，我还想退这把键盘。

segments.en: Okay.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: May I ask what the reason for returning these products is?
segments.cn: 请问退这些产品的原因是什么？

segments.en: The TV flickers a lot when I am watching a movie, and at times the image is not very clear.
segments.cn: 电视在我看电影时闪烁很多，有时画面不太清晰。

segments.en: I see.
segments.cn: 我明白了。

segments.en: And what about the keyboard?
segments.cn: 那键盘呢？

segments.en: I spilled some coffee on it, and now it won't work.
segments.cn: 我把咖啡洒上去了，现在它不工作了。

segments.en: I'm sorry, ma'am, but we can only exchange or refund defective products.
segments.cn: 对不起，女士，但我们只能换或退不合格的产品。

segments.en: We cannot take responsibility for misuse or damages.
segments.cn: 我们不能对误用或损坏负责。

segments.en: Fine.
segments.cn: 好吧。

segments.en: I don't know why they make these things so delicate anyways.
segments.cn: 我不知道为什么他们做的东西这么脆弱。

segments.en: All right.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: We're back.
segments.cn: 我们回来了。

segments.en: So now let's take a look at a couple of phrases we've picked out for To Be Exact on Fluency Builder.
segments.cn: 现在让我们看看我们为“准确性”挑选的几个短语。

segments.en: The first verb we have today here in Fluency Builder is the main verb in today's dialogue, to return.
segments.cn: 今天在“流利构建”中我们有的第一个动词是对话中的主要动词，退。

segments.en: So I would like to return this TV.
segments.cn: 所以我想退这台电视。

segments.en: Okay, so when you want to give back a product, you don't say, I want to give back or anything like this.
segments.cn: 好的，当你想要归还一个产品时，你不会说，我想要归还或类似的说法。

segments.en: You say, I want to return this product.
segments.cn: 你会说，我想退这个产品。

segments.en: Well, it's not just giving back.
segments.cn: 嗯，这不仅仅是归还。

segments.en: It's giving back and getting your money back.
segments.cn: 这是归还并拿回你的钱。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So to return means that you bring back the product, and the store will give you back your money.
segments.cn: 所以退意味着你把产品带回，商店会把钱还给你。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: And he wanted to return the TV, as we mentioned, because the image was not very clear.
segments.cn: 他想退电视，因为如我们所提到的，画面不太清晰。

segments.en: But he also mentioned that the TV flickers a lot.
segments.cn: 但他还提到电视闪烁很多。

segments.en: So what is this, to flicker?
segments.cn: 那么，闪烁是什么？

segments.en: To flicker is another verb.
segments.cn: 闪烁是另一个动词。

segments.en: And flicker is something that things with light do.
segments.cn: 闪烁是光源的东西所做的事情。

segments.en: The light flickers, the TV flickers.
segments.cn: 光闪烁，电视闪烁。

segments.en: It means the light comes on and off, on and off, on and off.
segments.cn: 这意味着光亮开又关，开又关，开又关。

segments.en: So dark light, dark light.
segments.cn: 所以暗光，暗光。

segments.en: It's not very steady.
segments.cn: 这不是很稳定。

segments.en: It's not like there's light or dark.
segments.cn: 不是说有光或暗。

segments.en: And so this is very annoying when you're watching TV because it goes light, dark, light, dark, and it's hard to see what's happening.
segments.cn: 所以在你看电视时这非常烦人，因为它亮，暗，亮，暗，很难看清发生了什么。

segments.en: Exactly.
segments.cn: 正是如此。

segments.en: So it's basically, just imagine someone is turning on and off the light all the time.
segments.cn: 所以基本上，想象一下有人一直在开关灯。

segments.en: That's the same thing that's happening with the TV.
segments.cn: 这就是电视发生的事情。

segments.en: It flickers.
segments.cn: 它闪烁。

segments.en: Exactly.
segments.cn: 正是如此。

segments.en: Or like when a light bulb in your lamp, when a light bulb is dying, it flickers.
segments.cn: 或者就像当你的灯泡快坏时，它会闪烁。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: All right, so we wanted to actually return these goods.
segments.cn: 好吧，所以我们想要退这些商品。

segments.en: And the clerk explained that we can exchange or we can refund defective products.
segments.cn: 店员解释说我们可以换或退不合格的产品。

segments.en: Okay, these are two important verbs.
segments.cn: 好的，这两个动词很重要。

segments.en: Exchange means to trade one thing for another.
segments.cn: 交换意味着用一种东西换另一种东西。

segments.en: So when I go to a foreign country, I exchange money, right?
segments.cn: 所以当我去外国时，我会兑换货币，对吧？

segments.en: I can exchange Japanese yen for American dollars.
segments.cn: 我可以把日元兑换成美元。

segments.en: Right.
segments.cn: 对。

segments.en: But at a store, like an electronics store, I can exchange my TV that I don't like for maybe a really good MP3 player or something like that.
segments.cn: 但在商店，比如电子商店，我可以把我不喜欢的电视换成一个很好的MP3播放器或类似的东西。

segments.en: So that's what happens usually if maybe your TV is broken or it had some problem, you exchange it for a new one, right?
segments.cn: 所以如果你的电视坏了或有问题，通常会换成新的，对吧？

segments.en: But maybe you don't want the TV anymore.
segments.cn: 但也许你不想要电视了。

segments.en: Maybe you changed your mind.
segments.cn: 也许你改变了主意。

segments.en: So you want to get a refund.
segments.cn: 所以你想要退款。

segments.en: So refund, you hear this word fund, it has to do with money.
segments.cn: 所以退款，你听到这个词“fund”，它与钱有关。

segments.en: A refund means that the store will give you all your money back.
segments.cn: 退款意味着商店会把你所有的钱还给你。

segments.en: So if I refund my TV, I give my TV to the store, the store gives me $500 or whatever the money for the TV was.
segments.cn: 所以如果我退我的电视，我把电视给商店，商店给我500美元或电视的价格。

segments.en: And I can buy anything else anywhere else.
segments.cn: 然后我可以在其他地方买任何东西。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So this is what happens when you get a refund.
segments.cn: 所以这就是你获得退款时发生的事情。

segments.en: Very different from exchanging the goods.
segments.cn: 与交换商品非常不同。

segments.en: And finally, the clerk explained that they cannot take responsibility for misuse or damages.
segments.cn: 最后，店员解释说他们不能对误用或损坏负责。

segments.en: So remember this as a phrase.
segments.cn: 所以记住这个短语。

segments.en: This is really important to take responsibility.
segments.cn: 这真的很重要，承担责任。

segments.en: It means that if something goes wrong, you will take responsibility for it.
segments.cn: 这意味着如果发生错误，你会对此负责。

segments.en: You will handle it.
segments.cn: 你会处理它。

segments.en: Alright, so for example, the store says that it can't take responsibility if something is broken.
segments.cn: 好吧，例如，商店说如果有什么东西坏了，他们不能承担责任。

segments.en: That means that they won't pay you back money.
segments.cn: 这意味着他们不会还你钱。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So if you buy a TV and you accidentally get it wet or you get water inside and this is why it gets damaged, then the store cannot take responsibility for this damage.
segments.cn: 所以如果你买了一台电视，意外弄湿了或者水进去了，这就是它损坏的原因，那么商店不能对这个损坏负责。

segments.en: Or you could say it the other way around.
segments.cn: 或者你可以反过来说。

segments.en: You could say, if you're at the office and you make a mistake on a report, you say, listen boss, I'm really sorry.
segments.cn: 你可以说，如果你在办公室里在报告上犯了错误，你会说，老板，我真的很抱歉。

segments.en: I take full responsibility for this mistake.
segments.cn: 我对这个错误承担全部责任。

segments.en: You can punish me or you can make me do it again.
segments.cn: 你可以惩罚我，或者让我要我重做。

segments.en: But I take responsibility means that I say it's my fault.
segments.cn: 但我承担责任意味着我说这是我的错。

segments.en: Right, you're guilty.
segments.cn: 对，你有罪。

segments.en: Alright, so that's all we have for Fluency Builder.
segments.cn: 好吧，这就是我们在“流利构建”中要讲的全部内容。

segments.en: Let's listen to our dialogue one last time and we can review everything we've just learned.
segments.cn: 让我们最后再听一遍对话，复习一下我们刚学到的所有内容。

segments.en: Hi, I would like to return this TV.
segments.cn: 嗨，我想退这台电视。

segments.en: Sure, do you have a receipt?
segments.cn: 当然，你有收据吗？

segments.en: Yeah, here you go.
segments.cn: 有的，给你。

segments.en: Actually, I also want to return this keyboard.
segments.cn: 其实，我还想退这把键盘。

segments.en: Okay, may I ask what the reason for returning these products is?
segments.cn: 好的，请问退这些产品的原因是什么？

segments.en: The TV flickers a lot when I am watching a movie and at times the image is not very clear.
segments.cn: 电视在我看电影时闪烁很多，有时画面不太清晰。

segments.en: I see.
segments.cn: 我明白了。

segments.en: And what about the keyboard?
segments.cn: 那键盘呢？

segments.en: I spilled some coffee on it and now it won't work.
segments.cn: 我把咖啡洒上去了，现在它不工作了。

segments.en: I'm sorry ma'am, but we can only exchange or refund defective products.
segments.cn: 对不起，女士，但我们只能换或退不合格的产品。

segments.en: We cannot take responsibility for misuse or damages.
segments.cn: 我们不能对误用或损坏负责。

segments.en: Fine.
segments.cn: 好吧。

segments.en: I don't know why they make these things so delicate anyways.
segments.cn: 我不知道为什么他们做的东西这么脆弱。

segments.en: So returning goods is a very useful thing if you maybe bought a TV at a department store or an electronic store.
segments.cn: 所以退货是非常有用的，如果你在百货商店或电子商店买了电视。

segments.en: Then you would want to return it if you had some problems.
segments.cn: 如果你有一些问题，你会想退它。

segments.en: Now, how easy or difficult is it to do?
segments.cn: 现在，退货有多容易或困难呢？

segments.en: Because in theory, in the dialogue, it seems like it's really easy.
segments.cn: 因为在理论上，在对话中，它似乎真的很简单。

segments.en: It depends on the store, of course.
segments.cn: 当然，这取决于商店。

segments.en: So some stores make it easier to do this, some stores make it harder.
segments.cn: 所以有些商店让这变得更容易，有些商店则更困难。

segments.en: I can tell you in most stores, if you don't have a receipt, it's probably very difficult.
segments.cn: 我可以告诉你，在大多数商店，如果你没有收据，可能会非常困难。

segments.en: Really?
segments.cn: 真的？

segments.en: Yes.
segments.cn: 是的。

segments.en: But a lot of stores have something else that they sell you or give you when you buy something.
segments.cn: 但很多商店在你购买东西时会卖给你或给你一些其他东西。

segments.en: It's called a warranty.
segments.cn: 这叫做保修。

segments.en: And this is something that will help protect you if you take the TV home and you have a problem.
segments.cn: 这会帮助保护你，如果你把电视带回家后遇到问题。

segments.en: That means that they will come fix it or they will give you a new one without any questions about what happened.
segments.cn: 这意味着他们会来修理，或者会给你一个新的，不会问发生了什么。

segments.en: Now, not only can you return goods such as TVs, electronics, or maybe clothes, but in some cases also things that you buy at the supermarket, like maybe chicken.
segments.cn: 现在，不仅可以退货像电视、电子产品或衣服这样的商品，在某些情况下，超市购买的东西，比如鸡肉，也可以退。

segments.en: I've heard that maybe sometimes you buy chicken and you open it up that same day and it's gone bad.
segments.cn: 我听说有时候你买的鸡肉当天打开就坏了。

segments.en: Really?
segments.cn: 真的？

segments.en: I've never had that experience, but I think it makes sense.
segments.cn: 我从来没有过这样的经历，但我觉得这很有道理。

segments.en: It depends where you buy it, of course.
segments.cn: 当然，这取决于你在哪里买。

segments.en: Right, obviously at a supermarket and you show the receipt, or maybe milk, maybe that's gone bad sometimes, or yogurt.
segments.cn: 对，显然是在超市，你出示收据，或者牛奶，有时候可能也坏了，或者酸奶。

segments.en: Well, because they probably shouldn't sell it if it's bad.
segments.cn: 嗯，因为如果坏了，他们可能不应该卖。

segments.en: Exactly.
segments.cn: 正是如此。

segments.en: So if you tell them that they sold you bad milk, they'll give you a new one.
segments.cn: 所以如果你告诉他们卖给你坏牛奶，他们会给你一个新的。

segments.en: Exactly.
segments.cn: 正是如此。

segments.en: So that's called an exchange.
segments.cn: 这叫做换货。

segments.en: You would exchange the bad one for the good one.
segments.cn: 你会把坏的换成好的。

segments.en: Right, you wouldn't get your money back.
segments.cn: 对，你不会拿回你的钱。

segments.en: No, maybe.
segments.cn: 不，可能不会。

segments.en: Maybe not, maybe.
segments.cn: 可能不会，可能会。

segments.en: Alright, so that's all the time we have for today, but this is actually a very interesting topic because it has to do a lot with customer service.
segments.cn: 好吧，今天我们只有这些时间，但这是一个非常有趣的话题，因为它与客户服务有很大关系。

segments.en: So let us know what your experience is with customer service, with returning something.
segments.cn: 所以让我们知道你在客户服务和退货方面的经历。

segments.en: Is it very easy, very difficult?
segments.cn: 是非常简单，还是非常困难？

segments.en: Maybe some stores don't even accept returns.
segments.cn: 也许有些商店甚至不接受退货。

segments.en: They say once you buy it, you cannot return it.
segments.cn: 他们说一旦你购买，就不能退货。

segments.en: All sales final.
segments.cn: 所有销售最终。

segments.en: Yeah, exactly.
segments.cn: 是的，正是如此。

segments.en: So let us know, are refunds or exchanges common where you come from?
segments.cn: 所以让我们知道，退款或换货在你所在的地方常见吗？

segments.en: And have you ever had a bad experience where you bought something and it didn't work when you got home?
segments.cn: 你有没有过糟糕的经历，买了东西回家后不工作？

segments.en: Let us know.
segments.cn: 让我们知道。

segments.en: Our website is EnglishPod.com.
segments.cn: 我们的网站是 EnglishPod.com。

segments.en: Alright, we'll see you guys there.
segments.cn: 好吧，我们在那里见。

segments.en: Bye.
segments.cn: 再见。

segments.en: Bye.
segments.cn: 再见。
